name: infidhells
storyline: In a world where the balance between good and evil is strongly in favor of good, so of heaven, you will incarnate a succubus and her twin brother incubus, whom are going to make their way out of hell, purge some humans and cathedrals, and then kick some angels asses in order to re-establish a better balance between realms.
summary: Infidhells is a Roguelite Puzzle-Game based on various stuff and of course Tetris. You'll encounter many foes, bosses, hectic items and game changing mechanics. Anyway, it should be great (when it actually works).
